thread.section_title: Cottman of Trenton Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cottman of Trenton | www.cottmanoftrenton.com
thread.title: Sage JerseyGirl
thread.title_full: Cottman of Trenton reviewed by Sage JerseyGirl

author: Sage JerseyGirl
title: Sage JerseyGirl
text:
We brought out son's 1995 Jeep Cherokee in to be looked at. We suspected it might need a new Flexplate & had gotten a price from another shop of $700.00. We called Cottman & Roland said, it might not be that, it could be a much less expensive repair, come on in & we'll evaluate it for free. My husband dropped it off & said if its under $200.00 do the repair, a few hours later Roland called to say it was lose bolts in several places w/the trans & torque converted and he had it all fixed & ready to go. We didn't have to wait for another day, after the initial evaluation, he didn't try to up-sell us on things we didn't need. He even told us that the transmission was in good condition & had been worked on before and that the motor & trans in this old Jeep would run for another 200K miles. This gave us some peace of mind about our teenage son driving it.
He was honest, trustworthy, a man of his word, polite and courteous. We couldn't have asked for a better experience here!
Absolutely recommend Cottman of Trenton on Olden Avenue in Ewing for your car's needs!
